yadi ātmā acetanaḥ tadā eva ākāśena sadharmā
evam vidvāṃsaḥ saḥ nityaḥ iti manyante
yathā ākāśaḥ cetanaḥ ātmā tu cetanaḥ
yathā ātma nityatā sthāpane ākāśe udāharaṇam

original: [atra dūṣaṇaṃ] ātmā ākāśaścābhinnau iti cedaikadharmyāt kathamākāśasyātmano dṛṣṭāntatā / (
analyzed: atra dūṣaṇam ātmā ākāśaḥ ca abhinnau iti ced aikadharmyāt katham ākāśasya ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭānta tā
bhinnau iti ced anya anya sādharmya aprāptiḥ
anyat ca ātmā nityaḥ na aindriyaka tvāt
yathā ākāśaḥ n indriyaka tvāt nityaḥ iti bhavataḥ sthāpanā
atha yat anaindriyakam tat na avaśyam nityam
etat ucyate praśna bāhulyam uttara alpa tā ca
ākāśaḥ tu indriya an upalabhyaḥ nityaḥ ca
katham bhavatā ucyate yat anupalabhya tvāt nityaḥ iti ucyate praśna alpa tā uttara bāhulyam ca

original: 6. anyacca / anupalabdhihetunātmā nitya iti bhavatā pratijñātam /
analyzed: anyat ca anupalabdhi hetunā ātmā nityaḥ iti bhavatā pratijñātam
ākāśaḥ ca ātmā ca bhinnauḥ katham ubhayoḥ anupalabhya tvam hetuḥ bhavet
anyat ca yat pañca mahābhūta mayam tat anityam

original: ākāśa ātmā ca pañcamahābhūtamayau kathaṃ nityāvuktau /
analyzed: ākāśaḥ ātmā ca pañca mahābhūta mayau katham nityau uktau

original: 8. anyacca / anupalabhyatvānnitya ākāśa iti bhavataḥ sthāpanā /
analyzed: anyat ca an upalabhya tvāt nityaḥ ākāśaḥ iti bhavataḥ sthāpanā
ākāśaḥ ca sarvavyāpī tatas ca kim sarvāṇi bastūni an upalabhyāni
anyat ca paramāṇuḥ avyāpī anaindriyakaḥ pi anityaḥ
anyat ca ātmā nityaḥ nindriyaka tvāt iti bhavat sthāpanā
saḥ yaṃhetuḥ vartamāne tīte na agate vā
atīte iti ced atīta tvāt naṣṭāḥ
yathā śṛṅge yugapad eva jāta tvāt na anyonya hetuke
anyat ca ātmā nityaḥ na aindriyaka tvāt iti bhavat sthāpanā
atha prāpya a prāpya vā hetuḥ iti
yathā agniḥ a prāpya dahana asamarthaḥ
asiḥ ca a prāpya chedanā samarthaḥ
ātmānam a prāpya katham hetuḥ bhavet

original: tato nitya iti bhavatpratijñā ātmā ca tadbhāvādanitya iti vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: tatas nityaḥ iti bhavat pratijñā ātmā ca tad bhāvāt anityaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ
kiñcid dagdhaḥ hi kambalaḥ prāyeṇa adagdha tvāt adagdhaḥ iti ucyate
anyat ca ātmā anaindriyaka tvāt ākāśa tulyaḥ iti bhavat sthāpanā
ātmanaḥ upalabdhiḥ iti ced tat ākāśaḥ api sukha dūḥkha dikam upalabheta
anyat ca ātmanaḥ sadbhāvavat nityatā niyatā
laukikānām saṃśaya sambhavaḥ nityaḥ nityaḥ vā iti

original: 16. anyacca / astyātmānaindriyakatvāditi bhavadvacanam atha vimarśaḥ kenāvaraṇenānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: anyat ca asti ātmā anaindriyaka tvāt iti bhavat vacanam atha vimarśaḥ kena āvaraṇena anupalabdhiḥ

original: yadi kāraṇaṃ na vidyata ātmārthasya hāniḥ /
analyzed: yadi kāraṇam na vidyate ātma arthasya hāniḥ
anyat ca ātmā an aindriyaka trvāt nityaḥ iti bhavatā pratijñātam
atha mūla kila udakāni anaindriyakāni api anityāni ātmā tu katham nityaḥ

original: 18. anyacca / sūtreṣu ātmano 'nupalabdhiruktā tasmāttasya nityatā jñāteti bhavataḥ [sthāpanā] /
analyzed: anyat ca sūtreṣu ātmanaḥ nupalabdhiḥ uktā tasmāt tasya nitya tā jñātā iti bhavataḥ sthāpanā
parantu na asti ātmā na asti ātmīyam iti api sūtreṣu uktam
nirgrantha dharme ca ātma anitya tā uktā
ātma nitya tve niyate sati sūtrāṇām vaiṣamya anupapattiḥ

original: 19. anyacca / yadi bhavatā ekameva sūtramadhigacchatātmā nitya iti manyate /
analyzed: anyat ca yadi bhavatā ekam eva sūtram adhigacchatā ātmā nityaḥ iti manyate
atha anyeṣām api sūtrāṇām pratīteḥ ātmā anityaḥ mantavyaḥ
ubhayathā pratītiḥ iti ced ekasya eva ātmanaḥ nitya tva anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ
anyat ca yadi sadbhāvāt iti hetunā ātmā asti iti
yadi abhāvāt na asti iti tadā tāla bījeṣu vṛkṣa ākāra abhāvāt tad utpatti aprāptiḥ

original: yadi kiṃcitsadeva na tadānaindriyakatvaṃ hetutvena prayoktavyam /
analyzed: yadi kiṃcid sat eva na tadā anaindriyaka tvam hetu tvena prayoktavyam

original: yadi ca sadeva tadā nānaindriyakatvena tasya sattā sādhyā /
analyzed: yadi ca sat eva tadā na anaindriyaka tvena tasya sattā sādhyā
yadi punar kaścid śabda nitya tām sthāpayet
tadā evamvidhaiḥ ukta pūrvaiḥ viśatim dharmaiḥ tadvat eva dūṣayet
nanu ātma sadbhāvāt eva bhavān ātmānam dūṣayati
yuktitaḥ na asya ātmā bhavatā tu

original: Uh 31) tatsadbhāvasya vikalpānmayā bhavato dūṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tad sadbhāvasya vikalpāt mayā bhavataḥ dūṣaṇam kṛtam
yat bhavatā uktam dūṣayitavya bhavāt asti ātmā iti
tatas dūṣaṇāt na asti ātmā iti jñātam
bhavataḥ ātma parigrahaḥ ātma abhāva dyotana artham iti ced tat ayuktam

original: idānīntu svayaṃ bhavatā mama siddhāntaḥ prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm tu svayam bhavatā mama siddhāntaḥ prayuktaḥ

original: nanu kathaṃ bhavatā jñātaṃ yanmayā bhavadarthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: nanu katham bhavatā jñātam yat mayā bhavat arthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ

original: atra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamiti cenmayā khalu pūrvamuktaṃ yatsvārthamaparigṛṇhatā bhavatā parasthāpanā parigṛhītā kathamidānīṃ punaridaṃ pṛcchyate
analyzed: atra kāraṇam vaktavyam iti ced mayā khalu pūrvam uktam yat sva artham a parigṛṇhatā bhavatā para sthāpanā parigṛhītā katham idānīm punar idam pṛcchyate

original: kathaṃ jñātaṃ yadbhavato 'rtho maya parigṛhīta iti /
analyzed: katham jñātam yat bhavataḥ rthaḥ maya parigṛhītaḥ iti
yatas bhavat vacanam viruddham tasmāt nigrahasthāna āpattiḥ

original: anyacca / anaindriyakatvātsannevātmeti bhavatā pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ paścāttu dharmabāhulyena sādhitam /
analyzed: anyat ca an aindriyaka tvāt sanna eva ātmā iti bhavatā pūrvam pratijñātam paścāt tu dharma bāhulyena sādhitam
sthāpita hetoḥ aniyata tvāt pratijñā virodhāt ca nigrahasthānam
tasmāt bhavat arthanāhau yadi punar aham kiṃcid dravīmi
yat mayā pūrvam uktam tasmāt etat na bhidyate

original: yadi vidvān gambhīraṃ nyāyaṃ bhāvayatyuktena dṛṣṭāntenārthāvagamasamarthaśca syāttadā tasya vāda evaṃvidhaṃ dharmaṃ nātikrāmati /
analyzed: yadi vidvān gambhīram nyāyam bhāvayati uktena dṛṣṭāntena artha avagama samarthaḥ ca syāt tadā tasya vādaḥ evaṃvidham dharmam na atikrāmati
vādī prāha evam uktaḥ vat adharmāṇām sāraḥ
eṣa vāda sāraḥ sarva vādānām mūlam
etasmāt vādāt pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ parama utkarṣa jñānam jāyate

original: yathā bīje sukṣetra upte mūlāṅkurāḥ samṛddhāḥ /
analyzed: yathā bīje su kṣetre upte mūla aṅkurāḥ samṛddhāḥ
ku kṣetre tu upte phala bhāvaḥ eva
yadi vidvān kaścid pramāṇa vicāra kuśalaḥ tadā vādān utpādayati
mūrkhaḥ tu alpabuddhiḥ etad vāda abhyāsena api tad avagama asamarthaḥ tattvataḥ vidvān nā ucyate

original: tasmādye ye sañjñānotpattiṃ subhāśubhavivekañcecchanti taistaireva saddharmavāda āśrayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ye ye sañjñāna utpattim subha aśubha vivekam ca icchanti taiḥ taiḥ eva saddharma vādaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ
